name: Sinless Mississippi Sin
author: KATRINAW
summary: The 'sinful' version of this recipe was served at my Bridal Shower, and now the recipe is the favorite appetizer of everyone I know!  It's delicious, easy, healthier than the original, and a hit at any party!
ingredients: 1 ½ cups shredded white Cheddar cheese
1 (6.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F ( 190 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, beat the Neufchatel cheese until soft
Stir in Cheddar cheese, sour cream, green chiles, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, green onions, artichoke hearts, salt and pepper
Slice the top off the bread, and hollow the bread out
Spoon cheese and artichoke mixture into the bread bowl
Replace the top of the bread, and wrap entire bread bowl in aluminum foil
Bake for 40 minutes in the preheated oven
Remove from oven, and stir in tomatoes
